amendment.description: Amendment adds trend monitoring of the introduction and establishment of nonnative species, including their pathways for introduction in estuarine zones to the list of research programs the Administrator can carry out.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-463 to add trend monitoring of the introduction and establishment of nonnative species, including their pathways for introduction in estuarine zones to the list of research programs the Administrator can carry out.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Moore (WI).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
